## Preparing Currency Data

```{r tidy}
currExchWithoutNA <- currExchRates %>% select(which(colMeans(is.na(.)) < 0.2))
currExchAfterEuro <- currExchWithoutNA %>% mutate(
  r_num = row_number(),
  Euro = ifelse(r_num %in% 1:992, 0, Euro)) %>%
  select(-"r_num")
replacedCurr <- na_ma(currExchAfterEuro, k = 1)


```
